column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Deep dish pizza was on my mind before I even hopped on the plane from Vegas to Chicago. Just like in New York
column2: Chicago is no exception when it comes to pizza joints battling out to claim themselves as the best pizzeria for deep dish. Fortunately
column3: based on the helpful suggestions of several locals
column4: my friends and I chose Lou Malnati's as our culinary introduction to Chicago.
